title: 4th-Grade Arabic Reading Comprehension Enhancement Program: Constructivist Multimodal Interactive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Arabic Grammar and Vocabulary, Elementary Reading Comprehension Experience
context.additional_context: Arabic text analysis competency required for social domain professionals, with continuous formative feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can summarize the core content of Arabic texts across various genres with 80% accuracy.
Learners can derive implicit meanings with over 70% accuracy through text-based reasoning activities.
Learners can reconstruct complex Arabic sentences with 90% accuracy using visual aids and digital collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
